name: Tagit extension
description: The official tagit extension, save and view later
content_security_policy: font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com;frame-src 'self' https://www.w3schools.com;img-src 'self';manifest-src 'self';media-src 'self' blob:;object-src 'self';script-src 'self' 'sha256-k6pV2csTYIQ8fwVNaLjYOTphB1rzl8yIg1do5U0bKRY=' 'sha256-FJLSjx1rhnAk8XlOhsZyYTRtkTvG9Uq53BROEdempuw=' 'sha256-QRor8Jrd4PQ2eLdc+q7QKB7JZfYQq5mb/Lorx5c+hXw=' https://apis.google.com;style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com;worker-src 'self';
